amendment.description: Pursuant to H. Res. 323, the amendments printed in Part A of H. Rept. 106-366 were considered as adopted. The amendments make technical changes and clarify provisions to ensure that employers cannot be held liable unless they are making medical decisions.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by the Committee on Rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A004) Agreed to without objection.
